rows.label: qst100403_msg0001
rows.name:
I'll practice on my own until
the medicine is ready, mo!

rows.label: qst100403_msg0002
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Fungooo~♪ Funga~♪ Funga~♪ Hogeeee~♪

rows.label: qst100403_msg0003
rows.name:
The medicine is ready,
mo?! That's amazing, mo!

rows.label: qst100403_msg0004
rows.name:
So this is the legendary
Utamakunarurun... I'll drink it, mo!

rows.label: qst100403_msg0005
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Gulp! Gulp! Gulp!

rows.label: qst100403_msg0006
rows.name:
It tastes bitter and sweet at the same
time, I'm not sure what to make of it...
But I'll try singing right away, mo!

rows.label: qst100403_msg0007
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Faaa~♪ Fuga~♪ Gyobooo~~♪

rows.label: qst100403_msg0008
rows.name: ...How was it, mo?

rows.label: qst100403_msg0101
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: qst100403_msg0102
rows.name: Be honest

rows.label: qst100403_msg0103
rows.name: Compliment her

rows.label: qst100403_msg0201
rows.name:
Mmmmooo! I knew it! Even after
drinking the medicine, I'm
still a terrible singer, mo!

rows.label: qst100403_msg0301
rows.name: ...Is your sense of pitch okay, mo?

rows.label: qst100403_msg0302
rows.name:
Even I can tell that I'm still
a terrible singer, mo...

rows.label: qst100403_msg0401
rows.name:
Maybe the ingredient ratio
wasn't quite right, mo.

rows.label: qst100403_msg0402
rows.name:
Please don't apologize, mo!
Falala is the one making the
unreasonable request, mo...

rows.label: qst100403_msg0403
rows.name:
I'm sorry, but... could you
please change the ratio and
make the medicine again, mo?

rows.label: qst100403_msg0404
rows.name:
For Falala's dream... So
Solala won't feel lonely...

rows.label: qst100403_msg0405
rows.name: Please, I'm counting on you, mo!

rows.label: qst100403_msg0501
rows.name:
It's stuck in my throat... and my
tummy is all warm and fuzzy, mo...
I'll try singing right away, mo!

rows.label: qst100403_msg0502
rows.name: Rururu~♪ Rururu~♪ Rurirarara~~~~♪

rows.label: qst100403_msg0503
rows.name: Momomomo~?!

rows.label: qst100403_msg0504
rows.name:
An incredibly beautiful singing
voice came out of me, mo~!

rows.label: qst100403_msg0505
rows.name: It's time for my stage debut, mo~!

rows.label: qst100403_msg0601
rows.name:
For the medicine, you need to
gather Cranberrin Bells and
Panda Pansies from Gula...

rows.label: qst100403_msg0602
rows.name:
If you boil them together with
the perfect blend, you should be
able to make the medicine, mo.

rows.label: qst100403_msg0603
rows.name:
When you make it, you can borrow the
kitchen in the dining hall, mo.
